---
name: Tech debt
about: Track refactors or cleanup items
title: "tech-debt: <short summary>"
labels: ["tech debt"]
assignees: ""
---

## Smell
- What is the debt? (describe current state)

## Impact
- User / developer pain caused today.

## Risk if Ignored
- Near-term failures or blockers if untouched.

## Suggested Refactor
- High-level plan or spike needed; link to CODE-NAV modules.

## Estimate
- Rough size (S/M/L) + prerequisites.
